name: Mental Space
description:
Explore the vast space, as you carefully advance and manage the little resources left! One day, you will find a way back home...

This is the entry for LibGDX, you can get the source code on github (gdxjam-ugg).

Controls are very easy! All you need to do is touch :D and then, explore.

Release Notes:

V1.1: Game-closer bug fixed, and other minor bugs too.

V1.2: Camera follows the ship toggling the bottom-right button (or spacebar shortcut). Uncheck it and it will be back to normal. Enjoy!
